== Itakadibbanahalli (610869) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Itakadibbanahalli is a village in the [[Madhugiri ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 1880.57 hectares and harbouring 966 households with total population of 4145 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Madhugiri]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 2107 and female population is 2038. Scheduled Caste Population is 1263 and Scheduled Tribes population is 296. Census Location Code of the village is 610869<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 1073 (52.65%)
